Intercepted RSA messages, encrypted with different keys, share a secret prime—can you factor their moduli and decrypt ciphertext1: 3705831106279170965336074390951009326280277866852798104448271578052986683498762694032164521039904438357564775988238195211065318618005250441334930007704531, ciphertext2: 9821218559661245502204980282451736543720547285831556968875953326444980386027829132858117290019530832318379963963456726730786144654175723584106534785633402?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=11522665323032640979038029474786162339816281849516204330271612401432443714912727377027309686981080862000074003275066453091060686336299700613418254506899801, n2=11235790990448718159661709259442180359775089653459979451686796272185119077958622830915486183225118130027452862208331213435161226063630120022392187274072487, e=8480744592748237000854845983622837601107442465516871232412074312802587737157128983512185252658978570267992612239289848142412829019246335961884996556906301

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{iutntrf9}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 3705831106279170965336074390951009326280277866852798104448271578052986683498762694032164521039904438357564775988238195211065318618005250441334930007704531, ciphertext2: 9821218559661245502204980282451736543720547285831556968875953326444980386027829132858117290019530832318379963963456726730786144654175723584106534785633402
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=11522665323032640979038029474786162339816281849516204330271612401432443714912727377027309686981080862000074003275066453091060686336299700613418254506899801, n2=11235790990448718159661709259442180359775089653459979451686796272185119077958622830915486183225118130027452862208331213435161226063630120022392187274072487, e=8480744592748237000854845983622837601107442465516871232412074312802587737157128983512185252658978570267992612239289848142412829019246335961884996556906301
extra_info: p=100992233416202999580098980394190572880120662675284879372723971678421197982189, q=114094568792692594604987289368514340394387922348895458146027556341093312810909, r=98477877688147553035578679815854657364445659007929131463644689360042536762643, φ(n1)=11522665323032640979038029474786162339816281849516204330271612401432443714912512290225100791386895775730311298361791944506036505998780949085398739996106704, φ(n2)=11235790990448718159661709259442180359775089653459979451686796272185119077958410258469005343077477564058268493210572379853804401474020447776691051424498936
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
